name: CBService
desc: A collection of data and associated behaviors that accomplish a function or feature of a device.

items.name: var peripheral: CBPeripheral?
items.desc: The peripheral to which this service belongs.

items.name: var isPrimary: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the type of service is primary or secondary.

items.name: var characteristics: [CBCharacteristic]?
items.desc: A list of characteristics discovered in this service.

items.name: var includedServices: [CBService]?
items.desc: A list of included services discovered in this service.
